entry.title: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 8:19AM CST by NWS
entry.summary: .Heavy rain is expected to continue to develop and expand across the area from now through the middle of the afternoon ahead of a strong cold front working slowly southeast across the area. With soil moisture relatively high, runoff from this rainfall will continue to fill small ditches and streams to bankfull in a short period of time, leading to overland and road flooding.
